website_summaries.verdict: This is a powerful battery that is compatible in a wide range of Makita tools, even including older models.
pros: Works even in old model Makita power tools, breathing new life into them
Batteries don't get hot while in use or charging
cons: These batteries lack the protective plastic caps that come with Makita batteries

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement batteries!
customer_reviews.text: I have an older Makita drill and these batteries are a great replacement for the original. The charge with the original charger and provide plenty of power. I drilled several holes in metal conduit for a swing and a single battery provided power to dill all the holes I needed. I also use the batteries to power several Arduino projects. The voltage is just right for projects needing up to 12 Volts and they last for long time-lapse shoots. I printed a base for the battery to make easy attachment to my projects.
customer_reviews.author: MontanaMonkTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Good Makita replacement battery
customer_reviews.text: These replaced the model 9000 batteries used in my Makita 6095D drill motor. They charged up quickly in the DC9700A charger. This drill motor is the old one I use around my home. I have not used them often but they seem to have held a full charge for a couple weeks now. Considering my brief experience I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Larry K.

customer_reviews.title: Very good replacement batteries.
customer_reviews.text: These batteries seem to be as good or better than original Makita batteries. Only reason for 4 stars instead of 5 is haven't had them long enough although all indications are that they are even better than originals.
customer_reviews.author: Alekona

customer_reviews.title: It's probable not bad for batteries that are close to 20 years old
customer_reviews.text: My old Makita right angle drill is not used often, but when needed it is missed because the battery holds a charge for about 6 screws. It's probable not bad for batteries that are close to 20 years old. Now I have 2 new batteries that have my old drill going like new again. If you have an old makita sitting around, get 2 new batteries and you will have a drill that will last better than any new drill you can get for twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Little

customer_reviews.title: They are a hard fit
customer_reviews.text: These batteries are fat and hard to remove from the charger, hard to insert into the tool and even more difficult to remove. I had to use pliers to get enough grip to remove once up inside the tool. They're just too big.
customer_reviews.author: zekesays

customer_reviews.title: Great batteries for your Makita Power tools
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 4 of these and used them this weekend to put up 45 ft of wood fence. They worked great, On two batteries, with one recharge each they drove almost 5 pounds of 1 5/8" wood screws into fence boards. Will definitely order more of these things.
customer_reviews.author: Rover100

customer_reviews.title: Worst batteries I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Neither of the 2 batteries I received would take accept a charge. Not even a little one. I made the mistake of not figuring this out within the extremely short warranty period. When I tried to contact the seller about a refund, they did not respond to me. I would not recommend this product/seller/brand to anyone. The mnfg. should just avoid all the middlemen, and just ship these things directly to a recycling center, though they may not even be good enough to bother recycling.
customer_reviews.author: Bitty Bytes

customer_reviews.title: Good battery pack for older Makita tools
customer_reviews.text: Battery packs are a direct fit for my Makita right angle and conventional drills. It fits both drills snugly and provides the power source the tools require. Shipping was fast, cost was very reasonable & packaging was good. My only complaint is that battery's case is slightly larger than an OEM battery and is quite difficult to insert and very difficult to remove from the Makita charger. This is a small issue compared to not having a working drill only because the battery isn't available or is too costly to purchase for an older tool.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Gorton

customer_reviews.title: Brought new life to old tools
customer_reviews.text: I figured my old Makita tools were toast once the batteries gave out. I mean, who makes 9.6V tools any more? I particularly like my little 3" circular saw. Perfect for tile. These knock-offs fit well. These are not the longest lasting batteries, but you get two, so keep em both charged. These are Ni-MH batteries so they do not hold a static charge the way lithium ones do. Charge before you use.
customer_reviews.author: BLD

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit into drill handle and short run time.
customer_reviews.text: The batteries are slightly fatter than the original Makita battery making them difficult to insert and almost impossible to remove. Run time on full charge is only a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Landmann

customer_reviews.title: Here's your premature Energup review
customer_reviews.text: Ok, these work so far. I'm being pushed to enter a review and where batteries are concerned the only test is the test of time. How long will they continue to charge and operate normally. This can't be done in 2 weeks. They work right now but my observation is that they don't last as long as the standard factory Makita batteries and 3000mAh just might be stretching it a bit. I have no reliable way to test this capacity.
customer_reviews.author: tjm

customer_reviews.title: tight fit
customer_reviews.text: Battery was close to the right size and shape but didn't slide in or out like an original battery. When I contacted the company they suggested sanding the side down to fit the drill best. The power and voltage are correct but the batteries were not OEM size. This may require removal with pliers and undue stress on the tool casing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: After reading many positive reviews on these batteries I figured one more wouldn't hurt. They came fully charged it seems, although I haven't put them to any sufficient task yet. They fit perfectly in all three of my drills as well as in my three chargers. Torque is excellent and I look forward to great success with these and I intend to buy more. They seem to be a bit lighter than the originals. Well worth the money if you like your old Makita 9.6v.
customer_reviews.author: Mel How

customer_reviews.title: They didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I charged the batteries, the charger indicated a full charge. Next inserted into the drill, pressed the drill trigger and nothing! Tried charging again, again the charger indicated a charge and again the batteries did not start the drill, not even a groan of a charge, complete silence. And yes, they are the right size for the tool.
customer_reviews.author: jerry d

customer_reviews.title: A little bit fat for comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love my old 9.6v Makita right angle drills. Bought these because batteries do age and need replacement. These are working OK in light use at 6 weeks on BUT I’m cutting off a star because they are both a little too fat for comfort. They will go down tool handle if considerable force is applied. Getting them out takes some serious finger pinching and pulling. I worry that they may eventually need a plier to remove and that may break the plastic end and end their usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: WA islander

customer_reviews.title: Lower than advertised capacity.
customer_reviews.text: Fit and seem to work well. Tested with battery analyser and got 1.7ah not 3.0ah in description. Still not bad for nicads. Just not as advertised. Don't know how durable they are. Hope they last awhile. I believe the original batts were only 1.3ah so these should give better run time.
customer_reviews.author: richard m.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good battery. Even new they would not drive the ...
customer_reviews.text: Low power and don't hold a charge. Not a good battery. Even new they would not drive the drill like the Makita OEM battery.
customer_reviews.author: GF.

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement for Makita battery
customer_reviews.text: Products meets description. Is able to charge with factory charger and fit the drill like original equipment. The original batteries are NiCad, so went with NiCad replacements to make sure battery charger was able to correctly charge the batteries. This may not be the case for other replacement batteries that are NiMH.
customer_reviews.author: electonics hobbyist

customer_reviews.title: Working great, powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to hold a charge. Very powerful, long life. Very happy with these. I thought I had a problem, but it was my charger. These batteries are great and I use them both at work and at home. I notice they have two small screws holding the top on, so at some point in the future I could recell them. Buying another set.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Greetings ... Reviewer, The Energup High capacity 2Pack 3500mAh Makita 9.6v Battery is higher mAh than the previous set of batteries I order 3-4 years ago. I am hoping these new batteries will run longer and will have longer life than the former batteries. SacMac
customer_reviews.author: Fred MacRae

customer_reviews.title: Visually As Advertised ...
customer_reviews.text: This pair of batteries were purchased as a gift for a friend. While not a "Makita" branded product they look, and fit just same as. Will have to wait and see if these batteries have a longer run time post use, as they are advertised as "high capacity". This is the reason for the 4 star rating at this time.
customer_reviews.author: James A.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing as good as the original Makita batteries
customer_reviews.text: These are just OK, you absolutely need two or more of them even for simple jobs because they loose their power fast. Nothing as good as the original Makita batteries. Shame because in this day and age with our battery technology these should be many times better then what was made twenty five years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Don't fit well in tools
customer_reviews.text: The batteries seem to have proper voltage but they are wider than they should be and don't fit in my tools very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wolly

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Husband was very happy that these were still available for his 20 year old Makita (i think it's that old)! Anyway he put it in the charger and Badda Bing...perfect fit and now he can do more stuff around the house....finish the install of all the new IKEA cabinets for the laundry room!!
customer_reviews.author: L. PRUITT

customer_reviews.title: Batteries are equal to OEM Makita battery save they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Batteries are equal to OEM Makita battery save they are missing the protective plastic caps for the contacts. Delivery was quick
customer_reviews.author: John Hollenbach

customer_reviews.title: My drill works again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a Makita drill. I’m satisfied I don’t use it every day so I have no idea how long the batteries will last my other ones died many years ago but the drill is still good and now I have new batteries so it’s like new.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: have not had a reason to use the drill but initial impression excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Packaged overly well, both were partially charged and took a full charge in a short time. No heating of batteries or charger during charging phase. Put zip back into a 30+ year old drill, have not had a reason to use the drill but initial impression excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Wiley willy

customer_reviews.title: One is dead after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: After just 8 months one of the 2 batteries died. It may have had 3 total hours of use and I never took it to zero. Energup has offered to refund the cost up to 70%. They have a 1 year limited warranty and so far (I haven't got my refund yet) looks like they will make good on their warranty.
customer_reviews.author: D_Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with how well these work
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with how well these work as I have had bad luck with similar generic packs. They charge with the charger I have. Update 1-6-2019: Have had these more than a year now and they are going good. I am not a pro, just use them occasionally, but after them sitting in my truck for a few weeks I checked my drill and it ran strong today; these hold a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Renee'

customer_reviews.title: Great battery
customer_reviews.text: Worked out great. Worked with our old Makita drill. We were worried it wouldn’t fit the existing charger, but it did.
customer_reviews.author: gail russell

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: These batteries powered up our old Makita drill like a dream and both charged beautifully! My only reservation is that I can't predict how long the batteries will last. So far, so good, though!
customer_reviews.author: OC, CA

customer_reviews.title: Good Product ,Great price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to replace the OEM batteries for my 25 year old Makita drill. They charged right up and worked great. Time will tell about longevity, but for less than half of the price of a single OEM battery you get 2 replacements. I think it's worth a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a few days
customer_reviews.text: This is the second batch of batteries I bought from this vendor and used with 3 different tools and chargers. The batteries always work well for the few charges and then fall flat on their faces.
customer_reviews.author: A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Real Junk!
customer_reviews.text: I got only two recharges and the little red light on the recharger started flashing indicated the batterys were junk. What a waste of money stay away!
customer_reviews.author: sixfooter

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packaged - hoping it works okay.
customer_reviews.text: Received poorly packaged - not like new product at all. Have not had the opportunity to test for any length of time but certainly hoping for the best.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Performed flawlessly when needed most.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to help with hurricane Irma prep. They rejuvenated my old Makita drill to its former glory and kept the drill running through three days of continual use. Great battery pair at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Don't last long
customer_reviews.text: Started out good in my Makita drill after replacing my 10 year old Makita batteries. They have been going down from there to the point I am back using my 10 year old Makita batteries after only 5 months. I do not recommend these batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not like the original Makita battery
customer_reviews.text: The batteries are not like the original Makita as far as longevity and lasting power. On the other hand they are 1/4 the price. Can’t except a whole lot more from a China replacement tool battery.
customer_reviews.author: pv builder

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Brought my Makita circular saw and drill back to life just in time to remodel the bathroom. Strong as when New.
customer_reviews.author: panfried

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Fits all my old Makita power tools perfectly. Holds a charge reasonably long. Good value for the money. I'm thinking of buying a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S

customer_reviews.title: One will not charge,  and the other is too weak to power the drill.
customer_reviews.text: Find original batteries if able. One did not charge at all and the other held a weak charge that didn't last long enough to be useable.
customer_reviews.author: Ramblin J

customer_reviews.title: Work fine.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used one of the batteries so far and it works just like it should. It took a charge and is powerful - everything one should expect.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho Camper

customer_reviews.title: Performs well definitely will buy again if needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my Makita battery operated tools. Quick charging and long be lasting with continuous use.
customer_reviews.author: David Stockham

customer_reviews.title: Very good replacement batteries
customer_reviews.text: Dlh says his Makita tools haven't worked this well in years. Old batteries were not holding a good charge. Great excuse to put off finishing a project right away! He will need a new excuse now. No problem using old chargers.
customer_reviews.author: TechLady

customer_reviews.title: Charge lasts surprisingly long.
customer_reviews.text: I've had bad luck with other aftermarket batteries. These work. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: R. LittleTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: They work great!!!
customer_reviews.text: They charge quickly and so far seem to hold a charge longer than the original batteries did, very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell.
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of charges these batteries seem to be holding up very good, time will tell so far as longevity.
customer_reviews.author: dewzter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Both batteries seem to charge and work well in my old Makita saw at a very reasonable price. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Updating my cordless drill
customer_reviews.text: My Makita cordless drill which is abouat 15 years old was running on slow. Finally updated the rechargeable batteries and Voila!! It works like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Laura G.

customer_reviews.title: Bring New life to your old Power hand tools!
customer_reviews.text: Bring New life to your old Power hand tools! My saw works better than ever, these last longer than I remember the OEM batteries
customer_reviews.author: StormTrooper80

customer_reviews.title: Well worth getting
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a couple of months now. They hold a charge well and they've made a world of difference in the three Makita cordless tools that I own. These batteries have made them useable again
customer_reviews.author: Bruiser

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my father in law. He was disappointed with the batteries. They wouldn’t hold a charge past 24 hours, even if you didn’t use them. Returned to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: B. Vautour

customer_reviews.title: A must for the Makita tool kit
customer_reviews.text: If you use Makita brand tools...you have to have extra batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Resurrected my 24 Year Old Drill.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, resurrected my 24 year old drill, which works like new. Ordered and received the same-day. Got two batteries for less than the price of one, special order, from my local big box hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth H. Merchant

customer_reviews.title: Great batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Charged up and working great! Can't give a long term report yet but I charged them and used them quite a lot for two days. They seem to last real well and have lots of power. Great for my older Makita tools.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: Early review!
customer_reviews.text: Performing as advertised. Great fit compared with other replacement batteries I’ve tried, plus they appear to be holding their charge well. So far these batteries have put new life into my older very reliable Makita drill, so hopefully they continue to perform as well as the originals.
customer_reviews.author: Radtec

customer_reviews.title: No way to know how well your product will work ...
customer_reviews.text: No way to know how well your product will work until it's used, recharged,used and recharged again and again...we both hope.
customer_reviews.author: Daddiot3

customer_reviews.title: Finding
customer_reviews.text: I have a oldrr Makita drill and these batteries were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ralph capel

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: Good price on replacement batteries for my old Makita drill. Very tight fit on installing and removing batteries from drill. Had to force in and out of drill, Seem to work well otherwise, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Jones

customer_reviews.title: These batteries hold a charge longer than the oem batteries ...
customer_reviews.text: These batteries hold a charge longer than the oem batteries and are much less expensive. The cells in these are also replaceable unlike the oem batteries.
customer_reviews.author: eflattuba

customer_reviews.title: Replaces Makita 9.6 drill battery perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Replaces Makita 9.6 drill battery perfectly! Charges properly, good life between charges. Good warrantee.
customer_reviews.author: Weatherbug

customer_reviews.title: Have not used them for long, but they charge ...
customer_reviews.text: Have not used them for long, but they charge up quickly and seem to work really well. Saved my old but reliable Makita drill from the dustbin!
customer_reviews.author: Skimmerson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't face parting with my older reliable 9.6 volt Makita. Inexpensive way to keep it around for a while longer. Batteries are a perfect match
customer_reviews.author: Marc Press

customer_reviews.title: Product works great but the shipping to a business address became a ...
customer_reviews.text: Product works great but the shipping to a business address became a poor delivery situation. Most businesses close by 5pm so delivery between 5 and 8 doesn't work well. There should be a way to convey that information better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Experience
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very timely, charged right up, used the same day, achieved my goal, VERY happy!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria L. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my old Makita, and higher mAH than my old more expensive battery
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: The only reason I don't like us because the battery runs out
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I don't like us because the battery runs out. Every morning weather I have used them or not I need to recharge them. 9.6 is not so strong but the charge should be able to stay for 1 night.not good product.
customer_reviews.author: azul c.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Felt it was a good price value. Delivered on time when needed. Haven't had it long enough to know about longevity.
customer_reviews.author: RWR

customer_reviews.title: The don't seem to charge to full capacity. They ...
customer_reviews.text: The don't seem to charge to full capacity. They were ordered to use in a small 3" circular makita saw.
customer_reviews.author: TzTreasues

customer_reviews.title: Restored my old Makita.
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine with my 1990s era Ni-Cd charger. The old Makita has a new life.
customer_reviews.author: JohnC

customer_reviews.title: One battery defective
customer_reviews.text: One battery defective and they don't seem to be labelled as 3.0 mah batteries seemed to be 1.5 mah on the label and not 3.0. I can confirm that these are roughly HALF the capacity as what they are being sold as. Not even sure how that's legal. Waste of time that delayed my project.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Finkle

customer_reviews.title: how long will it last
customer_reviews.text: i feel the product will not last near as long as the original battery.The weight is about 1/3,so it will store energy for a shorter time and will wear out sooner.I could not find original manufactuers batteries so this is what we will have to use. than the original battery and that indicates the battery is not going to store energy as long or last near as long.
customer_reviews.author: Zuniman

customer_reviews.title: Worked right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Thought I'd have to charge, but they came fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: T. R. Akin

customer_reviews.title: These are great. The power increase is there along with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I waited to get replacement batteries. These are great. The power increase is there along with the battery life increase.
customer_reviews.author: RPFree

customer_reviews.title: new life to an old drill
customer_reviews.text: worked and fit fine after contacts cleaned in the drill revitalized an old drill passed down after my father’s passing thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: The batteries came on time and well packed. I did find that they fit a little tight in the Makita drill.
customer_reviews.author: Arnie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Great packaging and a nice pair of gloves.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, was packaged properly, not expensive at all. Holds charge. A great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: 50% failure rate.
customer_reviews.text: 50% failure rate one battery holds the charge and works just fine the other battery will not hold a charge and does not work would not re-purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: California Mongo

customer_reviews.title: Seem to both hold charges nicely. Help off for a few weeks from the ...
customer_reviews.text: Seem to both hold charges nicely. Help off for a few weeks from the original purchase just to go through a few charges before rating.
customer_reviews.author: QuietFire

customer_reviews.title: The skeptic is a believer. Thanks, I would ...
customer_reviews.text: The skeptic is a believer. Thanks, I would have thrown the unit away before paying Makita prices, but these work well.
customer_reviews.author: George Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Failed to work
customer_reviews.text: The batteries did not work for my Makita 9000. I charged each one and nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Orange Pops

customer_reviews.title: Battery is good
customer_reviews.text: Had a little problem with contact drill to battery but opened contacts on drill and is working fine
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Husband happy
customer_reviews.text: Husband was happy to get replacement batteries so quickly. Likes them so far.
customer_reviews.author: Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice replacements that work well and hold a charge, unlike my 10 year old used batteries.
customer_reviews.author: MT director of fun

customer_reviews.title: My Makita drill is back in business
customer_reviews.text: I can’t speak to longevity yet since I just got them and began using them. But they seem to work fine and my drill seems full of energy.
customer_reviews.author: ASI

customer_reviews.title: so good.
customer_reviews.text: Only had batteries for 4 days. So far they seem to work very well. Charged and power drill as advertised. Only reason for 4 stars vs 5 stars is because I have no data on how long they will hold charge or how long they will last. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead drills come back to life.
customer_reviews.text: Had 2 old drills that have not had batteries for years. Found these on Amazon of course, price was very good and seem to be working fine and hold their charge.
customer_reviews.author: Frank L

customer_reviews.title: Fit just great!
customer_reviews.text: Got them and they work great in my Makita drill. By the way they arrived at my doorstep fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: dtorger

customer_reviews.title: A bargain well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Performed as well as original. Price was right for not one but two batteries. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: John D. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These batteries fit like factory batteries. The price was a lot less than factory and the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: scanless

customer_reviews.title: work just fine
customer_reviews.text: hold charge for a long time and last while in use better than 3500 mAh ones I bought.
customer_reviews.author: John McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: ... batteries fit my Makita drills perfectly and was a great replacement for the original Mikata batteries
customer_reviews.text: These batteries fit my Makita drills perfectly and was a great replacement for the original Mikata batteries.
customer_reviews.author: CindyMJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a differance, new batteries, make on an old drill.
customer_reviews.author: DJE

customer_reviews.title: Greatly pleased
customer_reviews.text: Great set of replacement batteries! They worked well with the elderly original charger. I appreciated the bonus set of work gloves that came with the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: A great set of batteries. Fits my older Makita drill perfectly. Unfortunately, after installing one in my drill I discovered that the drill was defective and unrepairable.
customer_reviews.author: JimA

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Charged them up immediately upon arrival and could ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Charged them up immediately upon arrival and could see a noticeable difference in the opoeration of the drill, compared to using the old Makita 9000.
customer_reviews.author: george m

customer_reviews.title: batteries
customer_reviews.text: i used these to wax my car, lasted about half hour, glad i have 3 batters
customer_reviews.author: ronlombardi

customer_reviews.title: Good battery.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my old drill. Original batteries wore out. These run the drill like it was new. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great co easy to work with. quality batteries
customer_reviews.text: Great co. batteries are top quality! Energup stands behind there product. price good. shipping good ,timely. will buy from them again. i want to cnx my first review,after working with this stand up co.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkins

product_meta.title: Energup High capacity 2Pack 3500mAh Makita 9.6v Battery Replacement Battery for Makita 9000 9033 193890-9 192696-2 632007-4
